text: TEMPLE COLLEGE SCHOOL OF VOCATIONAL NURSING VNSG 1331: PHARMACOLOGY Objectives Module 2 Anti-infectives Chapters 6,7,8,9,11, &12 1. Discuss the actions, uses, adverse reactions, contraindications, precautions, and interactions of various antiinfectives. 2. Implement important pre-administration and ongoing focused assessment activities the nurse should perform on the patient taking any of the anti- infectives. 3. Use the nursing process to implement care for a patient receiving an anti-infective. 4. Identify important points to keep in mind when educating patients and families about the use of the drugs covered in this module.
